mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def long_lexeme_frequency(text):
    words = re.findall('', text)
    long_words = [word for word in words if len(word) > 7]
    frequency = Counter(long_words)
    return dict(frequency)

mutants.original_line: long_words = [word for word in words if len(word) > 7]
mutants.mutated_line: long_words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 7]
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def long_lexeme_frequency(text):
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text)
    long_words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 7]
    frequency = Counter(long_words)
    return dict(frequency)

mutants.original_line: long_words = [word for word in words if len(word) > 7]
mutants.mutated_line: long_words = [word for word in words if len(word) <= 7]
